data.name: Snow Wars
data.description:
Step into the immersive world of Snow Wars. Gather your friends and prepare for thrilling snowball battles with up to 8 players, where skill and strategy will lead you to victory.

Snow Wars brings a refreshing twist to the shooting game genre by offering a casual yet engaging gameplay experience without any violence or bloodshed. Engage in intense battles armed with an arsenal of 7 unique weapons, including the:

- Snow Catapult
- Snow Machinegun
- Snowballs
- Snow Vacuum
- Ice Crossbow
- Snow Shotgun
- Snow Slingshot

Each weapon offers its own distinct play-style, allowing you to unleash creative tactics against your opponents.

One of the key differentiators of Snow Wars is its 100% handcrafted game assets. Every element in the game, from the mesmerizing views to the intricately designed maps, has been painstakingly created to provide an immersive and visually stunning experience. 

Explore four different maps, each with its own unique terrain and tactical advantages, as you navigate through breathtaking landscapes and discover hidden tunnels and secret locations.

Snow Wars offers four exhilarating game modes to keep the excitement going. In Single Player mode, challenge yourself against formidable Snowbeasts and put your skills to the test. 

Engage in intense team-based battles in Team Deathmatch mode, where coordination and teamwork are vital for victory.
